PDF/A is the ISO standard for PDF specialized in the archiving and long-term preservation of electronic documents. To use this mode you need to:
Set a PDF/A mode from the command line using the -pdf-a parameter and one of the following values:
PDF/A-1a
PDF/A-1b
PDF/A-2a
PDF/A-2b
PDF/A-2u
PDF/A-3a
PDF/A-3b
PDF/A-3u
Embed all the fonts. If you are using one of the basic fonts (such as "Times", "Helvetica", etc.), make sure you explicitly define CSS font faces for them. For details, see: .
